member.name: T:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.USBHost
member.summary: A USBHost module for Microsoft .NET Gadgeteer

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.USBHost.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.param: The mainboard socket that has the module plugged into it.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.USBHost.MountMassStorage
member.summary: Attempts to mount the mass storage device.
member.returns: Whether or not the mass storage device was successfully mounted.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.USBHost.UnmountMassStorage
member.summary: Attempts to unmount the mass storage device.
member.returns: Whether or not the mass storage device was successfully unmounted.

member.name: E:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.USBHost.MassStorageMounted
member.summary: Raised when the file system of the mass storage device is mounted.

member.name: E:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.USBHost.MassStorageUnmounted
member.summary: Raised when the file system of the mass storage device is unmounted.

member.name: E:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.USBHost.MouseConnected
member.summary: Raised when a mouse is connected.

member.name: E:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.USBHost.KeyboardConnected
member.summary: Raised when a keyboard is connected.

member.name: P:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.USBHost.MassStorageDevice
member.summary: The StorageDevice for the currently mounted mass storage device.

member.name: P:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.USBHost.IsKeyboardConnected
member.summary: Whether or not the keyboard is connected.

member.name: P:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.USBHost.IsMouseConnected
member.summary: Whether or not the mouse is connected.

member.name: P:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.USBHost.IsMassStorageConnected
member.summary: Whether or not the mass storage device is connected.

member.name: P:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.USBHost.IsMassStorageMounted
member.summary: Whether or not the mass storage device is mounted.

member.name: T:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.USBHost.MassStorageMountedEventHandler
member.summary: Represents the delegate that is used for the MassStorageMounted event.
member.param: The object that raised the event.
A storage device that can be used to access the SD card.

member.name: T:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.USBHost.MassStorageUnmountedEventHandler
member.summary: Represents the delegate that is used for the MassStorageUnmounted event.
member.param: The object that raised the event.

member.name: T:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.USBHost.MouseConnectedEventHandler
member.summary: Represents the delegate that is used for the MouseConnected event.
member.param: The object that raised the event.
The object associated with the event.

member.name: T:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.USBHost.KeyboardConnectedEventHandler
member.summary: Represents the delegate that is used to handle the KeyboardConnected event.
member.param: The object that raised the event.
The object associated with the event.
